thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wwe® Announces Financial Reporting Changes

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wwe® Announces Financial Reporting Changes
text:
World Wrestling Entertainment Inc:
* WWE® ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL REPORTING CHANGES * WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT INC - REPORTING CHANGES EFFECTIVE WITH Q1 2018 RESULTS
* WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT - REVISED ORGANIZATION WILL BE COMPRISED OF THREE OPERATING SEGMENTS: MEDIA, LIVE EVENTS, AND CONSUMER PRODUCTS
* WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT - BASED ON REVISED DEFINITION OF ADJUSTED. OIBDA, PREVIOUS 2018 TARGET APPROXIMATES TO AT LEAST $140 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
